body.name: Mini Dustpan and Brush Cleaner Set, Handheld Broom Dustpan Brush Cute Animal Style Dustpan Broom Portable Cleaning Brush for Table Desk Window Gaps Keyboard Kitchen Pets Nest(White)

features: Cute Animal Dustpan and Broom Set: Designed with a cute animal pattern, practical and adds fun. You will get a mini dustpan and a broom brush and they are the perfect tools for cleaning desktops, desk gaps, window gaps, keyboards, sofas, automobiles, corners, and some messes. And it can be used for the foods scattered by your pets.

Easy to Store: Our small dustpan broom set adopts an all-in-one storage that you can slightly put the broom into the dustpan for storage. With a hanging hole, allows you to hang them on the door, on the wall or anywhere else. Convenient for storage and help you to save space.

Practical Design: Our handheld dustpan broom has soft bristles that can capture and move dirt effectively and will not scratch the cleaning surface. Our dustpan has a wide lip that allows for maximum surface, close to the desktop at 0°, seamless, and contact that leaves no dirt behind.

Durable Material: Our small hand broom and dustpan set is made of premium plastic and soft bristles. The bristles are soft and flexible, durable and easy to sweep. Comfortable to hold, ensure comfort and maximum control while cleaning, easily cleaning the places including desks and wall corners.

Widely Used: Our mini dustpan measures 17 x 16cm/6.7 x 6.3inch(L x W) and the mini broom measures 11.5 x 13cm/4.5 x 5.1inch(L x W). Our handheld broom and dustpan set is suitable for desktop sweeping, keyboard dusting, desk, cars, countertop, cabinets, closets, sofa and more, providing more convenience in your daily life.

The soft and compact bristles can easily enter the edges and corners for effective cleaning to solve your cleaning problems for desk, home, kitchen and office Necessities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dustpan!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect compact size, and I love the cute baby chick design! I use it when traveling with my cat. She always kicks up litter from her litterbox, so this dustpan to sweep up her litter before leaving. Great item!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little dustpan and brush
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice little set. It is out of plastic like they are and pretty sturdy. I use these all over the place since I like the convenience of having them wherever I need them so I don't have to hunt them down. Getting them for a reasonable price is nice. Works as promised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute but a little challenging to use *Update*
reviews.reviewText: This broom and dustpan set is cute, but it’s a bit challenging to use. The set is lightweight and is made from plastic. It comes with a hook that’s easy to install. It has an adhesion that’s pretty strong. The hook is deep and makes it hard to remove the set from the wall. The broom is a tad bit hard to remove from the holding area. I got this for my children to use. My daughter was struggling to remove the broom as well. Also, a tiny bit of the orange paint was missing from the beak of the birds face. The broom set is on the small side and is suitable for small jobs.*Update*The adhesiveness of the hook no longer sticks to the wall. It has only been about 3 or 4 days and it fell off the wall and won’t stay up after being placed back. That is a bit surprising and disappointing because the adhesion was pretty strong at first. It just doesn’t last.

reviews.reviewerName: Super !! Conforme au descriptif Super !! Conforme au descriptif

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this specifically to sweep up the cat litter my cat likes to kick out of his litterbox and it's great! Does the job and is small enough that I can hang it on the cupboard in the same room. It actually comes with a little hook too. It saves me getting the hoover out every time my cat uses his litterbox...😂 Also, it's super cute. I got the yellow chicken one and it's adorable...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cute dustpan and brush. Got for my kids to be able to clean up their messes. It's very good. Nice size. Perfect for kids hands. And a lovely fun design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little dust pan and brush is cute and practical.It’s small but it’s a decent size to sweep up crumbs and tidy small areas. It comes with a hanging hook and I love how the brush slots into the pan when not in use.It’s well worth £4.59 at the time of review and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it.
